short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create graphic elements in Erizos Studio directly from chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Erizos Social is an add-on component to Erizos Studio, on-air graphics control application developed by Erizos.
With Erizos Social, you can turn any social media post into a rundown item in you Studio Show with just a few simple clicks.
All the content of the social post is inserted directly into your rundown and instantly ready for your CG operator to take to air.
